data.title: Brian Hill on LinkedIn: ✨CAREER UPDATE✨Last week, I signed off from FOX 5 Atlanta for the last…
data.meta_description: ✨CAREER UPDATE✨Last week, I signed off from FOX 5 Atlanta for the last time. I leave as a better storyteller, fulfilled, and with gratitude. For more than two… | 19 comments on LinkedIn
data.text: It's okay to quit a job after 1-2 years. Don't worry about how it looks on your resume. Anyone that cares about job hopping doesn't understand modern work. We change jobs a lot. Sometimes because of a bad boss. Sometimes because of a bad company. Sometimes because of bad compensation. And sometimes because we're curious. The future is multiple careers in one lifetime. Therefore, job hop. Smart companies get it. #Careers #Leadership
